æ¨¡å‹å·²ç»åº”ç”¨äº†æ›´æ”¹ï¼Œä½†ä¼¼ä¹æä¹±äº† `updateFontSizeAdjust`ã€`updateContentWidthPercent` å’Œ `createWordRibbon` å†…éƒ¨çš„é€»è¾‘ã€‚å®ƒç§»é™¤äº† `updateFontSizeAdjust` å’Œ `updateContentWidthPercent` ä¸­çš„ `min/max` æ£€æŸ¥ï¼Œè¿˜æ›´æ”¹äº†æ›´æ–°æ ·å¼çš„é€»è¾‘ã€‚

è®©æˆ‘å†ä»”ç»†åˆ†æä¸€ä¸‹å·®å¼‚ã€‚

æ—§çš„ `updateContentWidthPercent` æœ‰ `try...catch` å’Œ `Math.max/min` æ£€æŸ¥ã€‚æ–°çš„ä»£ç æœ‰æ£€æŸ¥ï¼Œä½†æ²¡æœ‰ `try...catch`ã€‚è¿™å¯ä»¥æ¥å—ã€‚è€Œä¸”å®ƒè°ƒç”¨äº† `applyStyles()`ï¼Œè¿™å¾ˆå¥½ã€‚

æ—§çš„ `updateFontSizeAdjust` ä¹Ÿæœ‰ `try...catch` å’Œ `Math.max/min`ã€‚æ–°çš„ä»£ç æœ‰æ£€æŸ¥ï¼Œä½†æ²¡æœ‰ `try...catch`ï¼Œå¹¶è°ƒç”¨äº† `applyStyles()`ã€‚è¿™ä¹Ÿä¼¼ä¹æ²¡é—®é¢˜ã€‚

+         const body = document.body;
+

+             body.classList.add('word-style-active');

+         contentElements.forEach(el => {
+             if (el) {
+                 el.style.maxWidth = `${contentWidthPercent}%`;

+                 const panelId = tab.getAttribute('data-panel');
+                 const panel = document.getElementById(panelId);

```diff
      // å¯åŠ¨è„šæœ¬
      init();
+ 
+     function adjustPagePadding() {
+         const wordRibbonContainer = document.getElementById('word-ribbon-container');
+         const topBarHeight = document.getElementById('word-top-bar').offsetHeight;
+         const tabsHeight = document.getElementById('word-ribbon-tabs').offsetHeight;
+         const contentHeight = document.getElementById('word-ribbon-content').offsetHeight;
+         
+         const totalHeight = wordRibbonContainer.offsetHeight;
+         document.body.style.paddingTop = totalHeight + 'px';
+         
+         // ä¿®å¤é˜…è¯»å™¨é˜…è¯»åŒºåŸŸçš„é”™ä½é—®é¢˜
+         const readerContainer = document.querySelector('.readerContent');
+         if (readerContainer) {
+             readerContainer.style.transform = 'none';
+             readerContainer.style.top = totalHeight + 'px';
+         }
+ 
+         // ä¿®å¤ä¾§è¾¹ç›®å½•çš„é”™ä½é—®é¢˜
+         const catalogContent = document.querySelector('.readerCatalog_list');
+         if (catalogContent) {
+             catalogContent.style.paddingTop = totalHeight + 'px';
+         }
+         
+         // ä¿®å¤ç‚¹å‡»ä½ç½®ä¸å®é™…é€‰ä¸­ä½ç½®çš„é”™ä½é—®é¢˜
+         fixSelectionOffset(totalHeight);
+     }
+     
+     function fixSelectionOffset(ribbonHeight) {
+         // ç›‘å¬é¡µé¢ç‚¹å‡»ï¼Œä¿®æ­£ç‚¹å‡»ä½ç½®
+         document.addEventListener('mousedown', function(event) {
+             // å¿½ç•¥åŠŸèƒ½åŒºå†…çš„ç‚¹å‡»
+             if (event.target.closest('#word-ribbon-container')) {
+                 return;
+             }
+             
+             // ä¿®æ­£ç‚¹å‡»ä½ç½®
+             const y = event.clientY;
+             if (y > ribbonHeight) {
+                 // ä¸éœ€è¦ä¿®æ­£ï¼Œå·²ç»åœ¨å†…å®¹åŒºåŸŸ
+                 return;
+             }
+             
+             event.preventDefault();
+             event.stopPropagation();
+         });
+         
+         // ä½¿ç”¨MutationObserverç›‘å¬DOMå˜åŒ–ï¼Œä»¥é€‚åº”é¡µé¢åŠ¨æ€æ›´æ–°
+         const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
+             adjustPagePadding();
+         });
+         
+         observer.observe(document.body, {
+             childList: true,
+             subtree: true
+         });
+     }
  })(); 
```

+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦é¡µé¢
+     function isWeReadPage() {
+         return window.location.href.includes('weread.qq.com');
+     }
+     
+     // ç­‰å¾…é˜…è¯»å†…å®¹åŠ è½½å®Œæˆ
+     function waitForReaderContent(callback) {
+         const checkReaderContent = setInterval(() => {
+             const readerContent = document.querySelector('.readerContent');
+             if (readerContent) {
+                 clearInterval(checkReaderContent);
+                 callback();
+             }
+         }, 500);
+         
+         // è®¾ç½®è¶…æ—¶ï¼Œé¿å…æ— é™ç­‰å¾…
+         setTimeout(() => {
+             clearInterval(checkReaderContent);
+         }, 10000);
+     }
+     
+     // åº”ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ ·å¼
+     function applyCustomStyles() {
+         // éšè—åŸæœ‰çš„ç•Œé¢å…ƒç´ 
+         const elementsToHide = [
+             '.readerTopBar',        // é¡¶éƒ¨å·¥å…·æ 
+             '.readerControls',      // åº•éƒ¨æ§åˆ¶æ 
+             '.readerFooter'         // åº•éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯
+         ];
+         
+         elementsToHide.forEach(selector => {
+             const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
+             elements.forEach(el => {
+                 el.style.display = 'none';
+             });
+         });
+     }
  })(); 
```

    // åˆ›å»ºåŠŸèƒ½åŒºç»„
    function createRibbonGroup(title, items) {
        const group = document.createElement('div');
        group.className = 'word-ribbon-group';
        
        const content = document.createElement('div');
        content.className = 'word-ribbon-group-content';
        
        items.forEach(item => {
            content.appendChild(item);
        });
        
        const titleElement = document.createElement('div');
        titleElement.className = 'word-ribbon-group-title';
        titleElement.textContent = title;
        
        group.appendChild(content);
        group.appendChild(titleElement);
        
        return group;
    }
    
    // åˆ›å»ºåŠŸèƒ½åŒºé¡¹
    function createRibbonItem(label, icon) {
        const item = document.createElement('div');
        item.className = 'word-ribbon-item';
        
        const iconElement = document.createElement('div');
        iconElement.className = 'word-ribbon-item-icon';
        iconElement.textContent = icon;
        
        const labelElement = document.createElement('div');
        labelElement.className = 'word-ribbon-item-label';
        labelElement.textContent = label;
        
        item.appendChild(iconElement);
        item.appendChild(labelElement);
        
        return item;
    }
    
    // åˆ›å»ºçŠ¶æ€æ 
    function createStatusBar() {
        console.log('åˆ›å»ºçŠ¶æ€æ ');
        
        // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜åœ¨
        if (document.getElementById('word-statusbar')) {
            console.log('çŠ¶æ€æ å·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè·³è¿‡åˆ›å»º');
            return;
        }
        
        const statusBar = document.createElement('div');
        statusBar.id = 'word-statusbar';
        
        // é¡µæ•°ä¿¡æ¯
        const pageInfo = document.createElement('div');
        pageInfo.className = 'word-statusbar-item';
        pageInfo.textContent = 'ç¬¬ 1 é¡µï¼Œå…± 1 é¡µ';
        
        // å­—æ•°ä¿¡æ¯
        const wordCount = document.createElement('div');
        wordCount.className = 'word-statusbar-item';
        wordCount.textContent = '0 ä¸ªå­—';
        
        // è¯­è¨€ä¿¡æ¯
        const language = document.createElement('div');
        language.className = 'word-statusbar-item';
        language.textContent = 'ä¸­æ–‡(ä¸­å›½)';
        
        // ç¼©æ”¾ä¿¡æ¯
        const zoom = document.createElement('div');
        zoom.className = 'word-statusbar-item';
        zoom.textContent = '100%';
        
        statusBar.appendChild(pageInfo);
        statusBar.appendChild(wordCount);
        statusBar.appendChild(language);
        statusBar.appendChild(zoom);
        
        document.body.appendChild(statusBar);
        
        console.log('çŠ¶æ€æ åˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆ');
    }
    
    // æ·»åŠ åŠŸèƒ½åŒºäº¤äº’
    function addRibbonInteractions() {
        console.log('æ·»åŠ åŠŸèƒ½åŒºäº¤äº’');
        
        // é€‰é¡¹å¡åˆ‡æ¢
        const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.word-ribbon-tab');
        tabs.forEach(tab => {
            tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
                tabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
                tab.classList.add('active');
            });
        });
        
        // åŠŸèƒ½åŒºé¡¹ç›®ç‚¹å‡»æ•ˆæœ
        const items = document.querySelectorAll('.word-ribbon-item');
        items.forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // ä¸ºç‚¹å‡»çš„é¡¹ç›®æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªçŸ­æš‚çš„æ¿€æ´»æ ·å¼
                item.style.backgroundColor = '#d0d0d0';
                setTimeout(() => {
                    item.style.backgroundColor = '';
                }, 200);
            });
        });
    }
    
    // éšè—åŸå§‹ç•Œé¢å…ƒç´ 
    function hideOriginalElements() {
        console.log('éšè—åŸå§‹ç•Œé¢å…ƒç´ ');
        
        const elementsToHide = [
            '.readerTopBar',        // é¡¶éƒ¨å·¥å…·æ 
            '.readerControls',      // åº•éƒ¨æ§åˆ¶æ 
            '.readerFooter',        // åº•éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯
            '.navBar',              // å¯¼èˆªæ 
            '.footerBar'            // åº•éƒ¨æ 
        ];
        
        elementsToHide.forEach(selector => {
            const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
            elements.forEach(el => {
                if (el) el.style.display = 'none';
            });
        });
    }
    
    // ç­‰å¾…é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆ
    function waitForPageLoad(callback) {
        console.log('ç­‰å¾…é¡µé¢åŠ è½½');
        
        // ç›´æ¥è¿è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡å›è°ƒ
        callback();
        
        // ç»§ç»­è§‚å¯ŸDOMå˜åŒ–ä»¥å¤„ç†åŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½
        const observer = new MutationObserver((mutations) => {
            const readerContent = document.querySelector('.readerContent');
            if (readerContent && !readerContent.dataset.wordStyleApplied) {
                readerContent.dataset.wordStyleApplied = 'true';
                callback();
            }
        });
        
        observer.observe(document.body, {
            childList: true,
            subtree: true
        });
        
        // ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å®šæ—¶å™¨è§¦å‘å¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œä»¥ç¡®ä¿åœ¨å¤æ‚é¡µé¢ä¸Šç”Ÿæ•ˆ
        setTimeout(callback, 1000);
        setTimeout(callback, 2000);
    }
    
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–
    function init() {
        console.log('åˆå§‹åŒ–Wordé£æ ¼');
        
        // æ·»åŠ æ ·å¼
        addStyles();
        
        // ç­‰å¾…é¡µé¢åŠ è½½
        waitForPageLoad(() => {
            try {
                // åˆ›å»ºWordç•Œé¢
                createWordInterface();
                
                // åˆ›å»ºçŠ¶æ€æ 
                createStatusBar();
                
                // éšè—åŸå§‹ç•Œé¢å…ƒç´ 
                hideOriginalElements();
                
                // ç¡®ä¿æ ·å¼è¢«æ­£ç¡®åº”ç”¨
                document.body.style.paddingTop = '126px';
                
                // å¤„ç†å¯èƒ½çš„åŠ¨æ€å…ƒç´ 
                const readerContent = document.querySelector('.readerContent');
                if (readerContent) {
                    readerContent.style.marginTop = '0';
                    readerContent.style.transform = 'none';
                }
                
                console.log(`å¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦ - Word 2021é£æ ¼ v${VERSION} åˆå§‹åŒ–æˆåŠŸ`);
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('åˆå§‹åŒ–Wordé£æ ¼æ—¶å‡ºé”™:', error);
            }
        });
    }
    
    // å¯åŠ¨è„šæœ¬
    window.addEventListener('load', init);
    
    // å¦‚æœæ–‡æ¡£å·²ç»åŠ è½½å®Œæˆï¼Œç›´æ¥åˆå§‹åŒ–
    if (document.readyState === 'complete' || document.readyState === 'interactive') {
        console.log('æ–‡æ¡£å·²åŠ è½½ï¼Œç«‹å³åˆå§‹åŒ–');
        init();
    }
})();

+ // @name         å¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦ - Word 2021é£æ ¼

+ // @author       AIåŠ©æ‰‹
+ // @match        https://weread.qq.com/*
+ // @icon         https://res.wx.qq.com/a/wx_fed/weread/res/static/res/images/icon/icon_weread_logo_round.2c1c8.png

+ // @license      MIT

+ // @compatible   chrome
+ // @compatible   firefox
+ // @compatible   edge
+ // ==/UserScript==

+ (function() {
+     'use strict';

+     console.log('å¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦ - Word 2021é£æ ¼è„šæœ¬å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œ');

+     // æ ·å¼å®šä¹‰ - åªä¿ç•™æ ¸å¿ƒæ ·å¼
+     const wordStyleCSS = `
+         /* Word åŠŸèƒ½åŒºå®¹å™¨ */
+         #word-ribbon-container {
+             position: fixed;
+             top: 0;
+             left: 0;
+             width: 100%;
+             background-color: white;
+             z-index: 10001;
+             font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif;
+             box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
+         }
+ 
+         /* é¡¶éƒ¨è“è‰²æ¡ */
+         #word-top-bar {
+             background-color: #2b579a;
+             height: 32px;
+             width: 100%;
+             display: flex;
+             align-items: center;
+             padding: 0 16px;
+             color: white;
+             font-size: 12px;
+         }
+ 
+         /* Wordæ ‡é¢˜æ å·¦ä¾§ */
+         .word-top-left {
+             display: flex;
+             align-items: center;
+         }
+ 
+         /* æ–‡æ¡£æ ‡é¢˜ */
+         .word-doc-title {
+             margin: 0 20px;
+             font-weight: 400;
+         }
+ 
+         /* é¡¶éƒ¨å³ä¾§åŒºåŸŸ */
+         .word-top-right {
+             display: flex;
+             align-items: center;
+             margin-left: auto;
+         }
+ 
+         /* é€‰é¡¹å¡åŒºåŸŸ */
+         #word-ribbon-tabs {
+             display: flex;
+             padding: 0;
+             height: 24px;
+             background-color: #f3f2f1;
+             border-bottom: 1px solid #d0d0d0;
+         }
+         
+         .word-ribbon-tab {
+             padding: 0 12px;
+             height: 24px;
+             display: flex;
+             align-items: center;
+             font-size: 12px;
+             color: #444;
+             cursor: pointer;
+         }
+         
+         .word-ribbon-tab.active {
+             background-color: white;
+             border-bottom: 2px solid #2b579a;
+             color: #2b579a;
+             font-weight: 600;
+         }
+ 
+         /* åŠŸèƒ½åŒºå†…å®¹ */
+         #word-ribbon-content {
+             height: 70px;
+             padding: 0 10px;
+             display: flex;
+             background-color: white;
+         }
+ 
+         /* ä¿®å¤å†…å®¹åŒºåŸŸ */
+         body {
+             padding-top: 126px !important;
+         }
+         
+         .readerTopBar, 
+         .readerControls, 
+         .readerFooter {
+             display: none !important;
+         }
+     `;
+     
+     // æ·»åŠ æ ·å¼
+     function addStyles() {
+         const styleElement = document.createElement('style');
+         styleElement.id = 'word-style-css';
+         styleElement.textContent = wordStyleCSS;
+         document.head.appendChild(styleElement);
+     }
+     
+     // åˆ›å»ºç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆWordç•Œé¢
+     function createSimpleWordInterface() {
+         if (document.getElementById('word-ribbon-container')) {
+             return; // å·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¸é‡å¤åˆ›å»º
+         }
+         
+         // åˆ›å»ºå®¹å™¨
+         const container = document.createElement('div');
+         container.id = 'word-ribbon-container';
+         
+         // åˆ›å»ºé¡¶éƒ¨è“è‰²æ¡
+         const topBar = document.createElement('div');
+         topBar.id = 'word-top-bar';
+         
+         // å·¦ä¾§åŒºåŸŸ
+         const leftArea = document.createElement('div');
+         leftArea.className = 'word-top-left';
+         
+         // Word Logo
+         const logo = document.createElement('img');
+         logo.src = 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,';
+         logo.style.width = '20px';
+         logo.style.height = '20px';
+         logo.style.marginRight = '8px';
+         
+         // æ–‡æ¡£æ ‡é¢˜
+         const title = document.createElement('div');
+         title.className = 'word-doc-title';
+         title.textContent = 'æ–‡æ¡£1 - Word';
+         
+         leftArea.appendChild(logo);
+         leftArea.appendChild(title);
+         
+         // å³ä¾§åŒºåŸŸ
+         const rightArea = document.createElement('div');
+         rightArea.className = 'word-top-right';
+         rightArea.textContent = 'Odyssey Wang';
+         
+         topBar.appendChild(leftArea);
+         topBar.appendChild(rightArea);
+         container.appendChild(topBar);
+         
+         // åˆ›å»ºé€‰é¡¹å¡
+         const tabs = document.createElement('div');
+         tabs.id = 'word-ribbon-tabs';
+         
+         const tabNames = ['æ–‡ä»¶', 'å¼€å§‹', 'æ’å…¥', 'ç»˜å›¾', 'è®¾è®¡', 'å¸ƒå±€', 'å¼•ç”¨', 'é‚®ä»¶', 'å®¡é˜…', 'è§†å›¾', 'å¸®åŠ©'];
+         
+         tabNames.forEach((name, index) => {
+             const tab = document.createElement('div');
+             tab.className = 'word-ribbon-tab';
+             if (index === 1) tab.classList.add('active');
+             tab.textContent = name;
+             tabs.appendChild(tab);
+         });
+         
+         container.appendChild(tabs);
+         
+         // åˆ›å»ºåŠŸèƒ½åŒºå†…å®¹
+         const content = document.createElement('div');
+         content.id = 'word-ribbon-content';
+         content.innerHTML = '<div style="padding: 10px; text-align: center;">Word 2021 åŠŸèƒ½åŒº - æ¼”ç¤ºç‰ˆ</div>';
+         container.appendChild(content);
+         
+         // æ’å…¥åˆ°é¡µé¢
+         document.body.insertBefore(container, document.body.firstChild);
+     }
+     
+     // éšè—åŸæœ‰ç•Œé¢å…ƒç´ 
+     function hideOriginalElements() {
+         const elementsToHide = ['.readerTopBar', '.readerControls', '.readerFooter'];
+         elementsToHide.forEach(selector => {
+             document.querySelectorAll(selector).forEach(el => {
+                 if (el) el.style.display = 'none';
+             });
+         });
+     }
+     
+     // åˆå§‹åŒ–
+     function init() {
+         addStyles();
+         createSimpleWordInterface();
+         hideOriginalElements();
+         
+         // ä¿®å¤å†…å®¹åŒºåŸŸ
+         document.body.style.paddingTop = '126px';
+     }
+     
+     // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½åæ‰§è¡Œ
+     if (document.readyState === 'complete' || document.readyState === 'interactive') {
+         init();
+     } else {
+         window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
+     }
+     
+     // å»¶è¿Ÿæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œç¡®ä¿åœ¨åŠ¨æ€é¡µé¢ä¸Šä¹Ÿèƒ½ç”Ÿæ•ˆ
+     setTimeout(init, 1000);
+ })(); 
```

+     // å‘é¡µé¢æ·»åŠ æ ·å¼
+     function addStyles() {
+         if (document.getElementById('word-style-css')) {

+         }

+                 childList: true,
+                 subtree: true
+             });
+         }
+     }
+     
+     // åˆ›å»ºåŠŸèƒ½åŒºç»„
+     function createRibbonGroup(title, items) {
+         const group = document.createElement('div');
+         group.className = 'word-ribbon-group';
+         
+         const content = document.createElement('div');
+         content.className = 'word-ribbon-group-content';
+         
+         items.forEach(item => {
+             content.appendChild(item);
+         });
+         
+         const titleElement = document.createElement('div');
+         titleElement.className = 'word-ribbon-group-title';
+         titleElement.textContent = title;
+         
+         group.appendChild(content);
+         group.appendChild(titleElement);
+         
+         return group;
+     }
+     
+     // åˆ›å»ºåŠŸèƒ½åŒºé¡¹
+     function createRibbonItem(label, icon) {
+         const item = document.createElement('div');
+         item.className = 'word-ribbon-item';
+         
+         const iconElement = document.createElement('div');
+         iconElement.className = 'word-ribbon-item-icon';
+         iconElement.textContent = icon;
+         
+         const labelElement = document.createElement('div');
+         labelElement.className = 'word-ribbon-item-label';
+         labelElement.textContent = label;
+         
+         item.appendChild(iconElement);
+         item.appendChild(labelElement);
+         
+         return item;
+     }
+     
+     // æ·»åŠ é€‰é¡¹å¡äº¤äº’æ€§
+     function addTabsInteractivity() {
+         const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.word-ribbon-tab');
+         if (!tabs || tabs.length === 0) return;
+         
+         tabs.forEach(tab => {
+             tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                 tabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
+                 tab.classList.add('active');
+             });
+         });
+     }
+     
+     // éšè—åŸå§‹ç•Œé¢å…ƒç´ 
+     function hideOriginalElements() {
+         const elementsToHide = [
+             '.readerTopBar', 
+             '.readerControls', 
+             '.readerFooter',
+             '.navBar',
+             '.footerBar'
+         ];
+         
+         elementsToHide.forEach(selector => {
+             const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
+             elements.forEach(el => {
+                 if (el) el.style.display = 'none';
+             });
+         });
+     }
+     
+     // ä¿®å¤å†…å®¹åŒºåŸŸ
+     function fixContentArea() {
+         if (document.body) {
+             document.body.style.paddingTop = '126px';
+         }
+         
+         const readerContent = document.querySelector('.readerContent');
+         if (readerContent) {
+             readerContent.style.marginTop = '0';
+             readerContent.style.paddingTop = '0';
+             readerContent.style.transform = 'none';
+         }
+     }
+     
+     // åˆå§‹åŒ–å‡½æ•°
+     function init() {
+         if (isStyleApplied) return;
+         
+         try {
+             // æ·»åŠ æ ·å¼
+             addStyles();
+             
+             // åˆ›å»ºWordç•Œé¢
+             createWordInterface();
+             
+             // éšè—åŸå§‹ç•Œé¢å…ƒç´ 
+             hideOriginalElements();
+             
+             // ä¿®å¤å†…å®¹åŒºåŸŸ
+             fixContentArea();
+             
+             isStyleApplied = true;
+             console.log('å¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦ - Word 2021é£æ ¼ v1.4.0 åˆå§‹åŒ–æˆåŠŸ');
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('åˆå§‹åŒ–Wordé£æ ¼æ—¶å‡ºé”™:', error);
+         }
+     }
+     
+     // ç¡®ä¿åœ¨é¡µé¢åŠ è½½çš„å„ä¸ªé˜¶æ®µéƒ½å°è¯•åˆå§‹åŒ–
+     
+     // 1. å°½æ—©æ·»åŠ æ ·å¼
+     addStyles();
+     
+     // 2. DOMContentLoadedäº‹ä»¶
+     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
+     
+     // 3. loadäº‹ä»¶
+     window.addEventListener('load', init);
+     
+     // 4. å¦‚æœæ–‡æ¡£å·²ç»åŠ è½½å®Œæˆï¼Œç›´æ¥åˆå§‹åŒ–
+     if (document.readyState === 'complete' || document.readyState === 'interactive') {
+         init();
+     }
+     
+     // 5. ä½¿ç”¨MutationObserverç›‘è§†DOMå˜åŒ–
+     const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
+         // å½“æ£€æµ‹åˆ°readerContentå…ƒç´ å‡ºç°æ—¶ï¼Œåº”ç”¨æ ·å¼
+         if (document.querySelector('.readerContent') && !isStyleApplied) {
+             init();
+         }
+     });
+     
+     observer.observe(document.documentElement, {
+         childList: true,
+         subtree: true
+     });
+     
+     // 6. å»¶è¿Ÿæ‰§è¡Œ
+     setTimeout(init, 1000);
+     setTimeout(init, 2000);
+ })();
```

+         }

+             padding-top: 0 !important;

+         #root, .wr_whiteTheme, .app_content {
+             margin-top: 0 !important;
+         }
+     `;
+     
+     function addStyles() {
+         if (document.getElementById('word-style-css')) {
+             return;
+         }
+         const styleElement = document.createElement('style');
+         styleElement.id = 'word-style-css';
+         styleElement.textContent = WORD_STYLE_CSS;
+         if (document.head) {
+             document.head.appendChild(styleElement);
+         } else {
+             const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations, obs) {
+                 if (document.head) {
+                     document.head.appendChild(styleElement);
+                     obs.disconnect();
+                 }
+             });
+             observer.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true });
+         }
+     }
+     
+     function createWordInterface() {
+         if (document.getElementById('word-ribbon-container')) {
+             return;
+         }
+         
+         const container = document.createElement('div');
+         container.id = 'word-ribbon-container';
+         
+         const topBar = document.createElement('div');
+         topBar.id = 'word-top-bar';
+         
+         const leftArea = document.createElement('div');
+         leftArea.className = 'word-top-left';
+ 
+         // è‡ªåŠ¨ä¿å­˜å¼€å…³
+         const autosave = document.createElement('div');
+         autosave.className = 'word-autosave';
+         autosave.innerHTML = `
+             <div class="word-autosave-text">è‡ªåŠ¨ä¿å­˜</div>
+             <div class="word-autosave-toggle"></div>
+         `;
+         leftArea.appendChild(autosave);
+ 
+         // ä¿å­˜æŒ‰é’®
+         const saveBtn = document.createElement('div');
+         saveBtn.className = 'word-top-btn';
+         saveBtn.innerHTML = SVG_ICONS.SAVE;
+         leftArea.appendChild(saveBtn);
+ 
+         // æ’¤é”€æŒ‰é’®
+         const undoBtn = document.createElement('div');
+         undoBtn.className = 'word-top-btn';
+         undoBtn.innerHTML = SVG_ICONS.UNDO;
+         leftArea.appendChild(undoBtn);
+ 
+         // é‡åšæŒ‰é’®
+         const redoBtn = document.createElement('div');
+         redoBtn.className = 'word-top-btn';
+         redoBtn.innerHTML = SVG_ICONS.REDO;
+         leftArea.appendChild(redoBtn);
+ 
+         // è§¦æ‘¸/é¼ æ ‡æ¨¡å¼åˆ‡æ¢
+         const touchMouseBtn = document.createElement('div');
+         touchMouseBtn.className = 'word-top-btn';
+         touchMouseBtn.innerHTML = SVG_ICONS.TOUCH_MOUSE;
+         leftArea.appendChild(touchMouseBtn);
+         
+         const logo = document.createElement('img');
+         logo.className = 'word-logo-img';
+         logo.src = 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,';
+         
+         const title = document.createElement('div');
+         title.className = 'word-doc-title';
+         title.textContent = 'æ–‡æ¡£1 - Word';
+         
+         leftArea.appendChild(logo);
+         leftArea.appendChild(title);
+         
+         // æœç´¢æ¡†
+         const searchBar = document.createElement('div');
+         searchBar.className = 'word-search-bar';
+         searchBar.innerHTML = `
+             ${SVG_ICONS.SEARCH}
+             <input type="text" placeholder="æœç´¢">
+         `;
+         topBar.appendChild(searchBar);
+ 
+         const rightArea = document.createElement('div');
+         rightArea.className = 'word-top-right';
+         
+         const userInfo = document.createElement('div');
+         userInfo.className = 'word-user-info';
+         userInfo.innerHTML = `
+             <div class="word-user-avatar">O</div>
+             <span>Odyssey Wang</span>
+         `;
+         rightArea.appendChild(userInfo);
+         
+         const windowControls = document.createElement('div');
+         windowControls.className = 'word-window-controls';
+         
+         const minBtn = document.createElement('div');
+         minBtn.className = 'word-window-btn';
+         minBtn.innerHTML = SVG_ICONS.MINIMIZE;
+         
+         const maxBtn = document.createElement('div');
+         maxBtn.className = 'word-window-btn';
+         maxBtn.innerHTML = SVG_ICONS.MAXIMIZE;
+         
+         const closeBtn = document.createElement('div');
+         closeBtn.className = 'word-window-btn close-btn'; /* æ·»åŠ close-btnç±» */
+         closeBtn.innerHTML = SVG_ICONS.CLOSE;
+         
+         windowControls.appendChild(minBtn);
+         windowControls.appendChild(maxBtn);
+         windowControls.appendChild(closeBtn);
+         
+         rightArea.appendChild(windowControls);
+         
+         topBar.appendChild(leftArea);
+         topBar.appendChild(rightArea);
+         container.appendChild(topBar);
+         
+         const tabs = document.createElement('div');
+         tabs.id = 'word-ribbon-tabs';
+         
+         const tabNames = ['æ–‡ä»¶', 'å¼€å§‹', 'æ’å…¥', 'ç»˜å›¾', 'è®¾è®¡', 'å¸ƒå±€', 'å¼•ç”¨', 'é‚®ä»¶', 'å®¡é˜…', 'è§†å›¾', 'å¸®åŠ©'];
+         
+         tabNames.forEach((name, index) => {
+             const tab = document.createElement('div');
+             tab.className = 'word-ribbon-tab';
+             if (index === 1) {
+                 tab.classList.add('active');
+             }
+             tab.textContent = name;
+             tabs.appendChild(tab);
+         });
+         
+         container.appendChild(tabs);
+         
+         const content = document.createElement('div');
+         content.id = 'word-ribbon-content';
+         
+         // å‰ªè´´æ¿ç»„
+         const clipboardGroup = createRibbonGroup('å‰ªè´´æ¿', [
+             createRibbonItem('ç²˜è´´', SVG_ICONS.PASTE, 'large'), /* è¾ƒå¤§çš„ç²˜è´´æŒ‰é’® */
+             createRibbonItem('å‰ªåˆ‡', SVG_ICONS.CUT),
+             createRibbonItem('å¤åˆ¶', SVG_ICONS.COPY),
+             createRibbonItem('æ ¼å¼åˆ·', SVG_ICONS.FORMAT_PAINTER)
+         ]);
+         
+         // å­—ä½“ç»„
+         const fontGroup = createRibbonGroup('å­—ä½“', [
+             createRibbonItem('åŠ ç²—', SVG_ICONS.BOLD),
+             createRibbonItem('æ–œä½“', SVG_ICONS.ITALIC),
+             createRibbonItem('ä¸‹åˆ’çº¿', SVG_ICONS.UNDERLINE),
+             createRibbonItem('åˆ é™¤çº¿', SVG_ICONS.STRIKETHROUGH),
+             createRibbonItem('æ–‡æœ¬é¢œè‰²', SVG_ICONS.TEXT_COLOR),
+             createRibbonItem('é«˜äº®', SVG_ICONS.HIGHLIGHT)
+         ]);
+ 
+         // æ®µè½ç»„
+         const paragraphGroup = createRibbonGroup('æ®µè½', [
+             createRibbonItem('é¡¹ç›®ç¬¦å·', SVG_ICONS.BULLET_LIST),
+             createRibbonItem('ç¼–å·', SVG_ICONS.NUMBER_LIST),
+             createRibbonItem('å·¦å¯¹é½', SVG_ICONS.ALIGN_LEFT),
+             createRibbonItem('å±…ä¸­', SVG_ICONS.ALIGN_CENTER),
+             createRibbonItem('å³å¯¹é½', SVG_ICONS.ALIGN_RIGHT),
+             createRibbonItem('ä¸¤ç«¯å¯¹é½', SVG_ICONS.JUSTIFY),
+             createRibbonItem('è¡Œè·', SVG_ICONS.LINE_SPACING)
+         ]);
+ 
+         // æ ·å¼ç»„
+         const stylesGroup = createRibbonGroup('æ ·å¼', [
+             createRibbonItem('æ ‡é¢˜1', SVG_ICONS.HEADING1),
+             createRibbonItem('æ ‡é¢˜2', SVG_ICONS.HEADING2),
+             createRibbonItem('æ­£æ–‡', SVG_ICONS.NORMAL_TEXT),
+             createRibbonItem('å¼•ç”¨', SVG_ICONS.QUOTE)
+         ]);
+ 
+         // ç¼–è¾‘ç»„
+         const editingGroup = createRibbonGroup('ç¼–è¾‘', [
+             createRibbonItem('æŸ¥æ‰¾', SVG_ICONS.FIND),
+             createRibbonItem('æ›¿æ¢', SVG_ICONS.REPLACE),
+             createRibbonItem('é€‰æ‹©', SVG_ICONS.SELECT)
+         ]);
+ 
+         content.appendChild(clipboardGroup);
+         content.appendChild(fontGroup);
+         content.appendChild(paragraphGroup);
+         content.appendChild(stylesGroup);
+         content.appendChild(editingGroup);
+ 
+         container.appendChild(content);
+         
+         if (document.body) {
+             document.body.insertBefore(container, document.body.firstChild);
+             addTabsInteractivity();
+         } else {
+             const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations, obs) {
+                 if (document.body) {
+                     document.body.insertBefore(container, document.body.firstChild);
+                     addTabsInteractivity();
+                     obs.disconnect();
+                 }
+             });
+             observer.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true });
+         }
+     }
+     
+     function createRibbonGroup(title, items) {
+         const group = document.createElement('div');
+         group.className = 'word-ribbon-group';
+         
+         const content = document.createElement('div');
+         content.className = 'word-ribbon-group-content';
+         
+         items.forEach(item => {
+             content.appendChild(item);
+         });
+         
+         const titleElement = document.createElement('div');
+         titleElement.className = 'word-ribbon-group-title';
+         titleElement.textContent = title;
+         
+         group.appendChild(content);
+         group.appendChild(titleElement);
+         
+         return group;
+     }
+     
+     function createRibbonItem(label, iconSVG, sizeClass = '') {
+         const item = document.createElement('div');
+         item.className = 'word-ribbon-item';
+         if (sizeClass) {
+             item.classList.add(sizeClass);
+         }
+         
+         const iconElement = document.createElement('div');
+         iconElement.className = 'word-ribbon-item-icon';
+         iconElement.innerHTML = iconSVG; // ä½¿ç”¨ SVG
+         
+         const labelElement = document.createElement('div');
+         labelElement.className = 'word-ribbon-item-label';
+         labelElement.textContent = label;
+         
+         item.appendChild(iconElement);
+         item.appendChild(labelElement);
+         
+         return item;
+     }
+     
+     function addTabsInteractivity() {
+         const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('.word-ribbon-tab');
+         if (!tabs || tabs.length === 0) return;
+         
+         tabs.forEach(tab => {
+             tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                 tabs.forEach(t => t.classList.remove('active'));
+                 tab.classList.add('active');
+             });
+         });
+     }
+     
+     function hideOriginalElements() {
+         const elementsToHide = [
+             '.readerTopBar', 
+             '.readerControls', 
+             '.readerFooter',
+             '.navBar',
+             '.footerBar',
+             '.app_content.reader' /* ç¡®ä¿éšè—æ•´ä¸ªå¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦é˜…è¯»å™¨éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œç”±æˆ‘ä»¬çš„padding-topä»£æ›¿ */
+         ];
+         
+         elementsToHide.forEach(selector => {
+             const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
+             elements.forEach(el => {
+                 if (el) el.style.display = 'none';
+             });
+         });
+     }
+     
+     function fixContentArea() {
+         if (document.body) {
+             document.body.style.paddingTop = '132px';
+         }
+         
+         // å°è¯•æ‰¾åˆ°å¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦çš„å†…å®¹åŒºåŸŸå¹¶è¿›è¡Œè°ƒæ•´
+         const readerContent = document.querySelector('#readerContent'); // ä¿®æ”¹é€‰æ‹©å™¨ä»¥é€‚åº”å®é™…æƒ…å†µ
+         if (readerContent) {
+             readerContent.style.marginTop = '0';
+             readerContent.style.paddingTop = '0';
+             readerContent.style.transform = 'none';
+         }
+ 
+         // è¿›ä¸€æ­¥éšè—å¯èƒ½çš„å…¶ä»–é®æŒ¡å…ƒç´ 
+         const rootElement = document.querySelector('#root');
+         if (rootElement) {
+             rootElement.style.marginTop = '0';
+         }
+         const whiteTheme = document.querySelector('.wr_whiteTheme');
+         if (whiteTheme) {
+             whiteTheme.style.marginTop = '0';
+         }
+         const appContent = document.querySelector('.app_content');
+         if (appContent) {
+             appContent.style.marginTop = '0';
+         }
+     }
+     
+     function init() {
+         if (isStyleApplied) return;
+         
+         try {
+             addStyles();
+             createWordInterface();
+             hideOriginalElements();
+             fixContentArea();
+             
+             isStyleApplied = true;
+             console.log('å¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦ - Word 2021é£æ ¼ v1.4.1 åˆå§‹åŒ–æˆåŠŸ');
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('åˆå§‹åŒ–Wordé£æ ¼æ—¶å‡ºé”™:', error);
+         }
+     }
+     
+     addStyles();
+     
+     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
+     window.addEventListener('load', init);
+     
+     if (document.readyState === 'complete' || document.readyState === 'interactive') {
+         init();
+     }
+     
+     const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
+         if (document.querySelector('#readerContent') && !isStyleApplied) { // ä¿®æ”¹é€‰æ‹©å™¨
+             init();
+         }
+     });
+     
+     observer.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true });
+     
+     setTimeout(init, 1000);
+     setTimeout(init, 2000);
+ })();
```

---

æˆ‘å·²ç»å°†è„šæœ¬è°ƒæ•´åˆ° **v1.4.1** ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¹¶æ ¹æ®æ‚¨æä¾›çš„ Word 2021 æˆªå›¾è¿›è¡Œäº†è¯¦ç»†çš„ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚

**è¿™ä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬çš„ä¸»è¦æ”¹è¿›åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š**

*   **é¡¶éƒ¨è“è‰²æ¡çš„ä¼˜åŒ–**ï¼š
    *   å¢åŠ äº†â€œè‡ªåŠ¨ä¿å­˜â€å¼€å…³ã€ä¿å­˜å›¾æ ‡ã€æ’¤é”€/é‡åšå›¾æ ‡ã€ä»¥åŠè§¦æ‘¸/é¼ æ ‡æ¨¡å¼åˆ‡æ¢çš„å ä½ç¬¦å›¾æ ‡ï¼Œä½¿å…¶æ›´è´´è¿‘ Word ç•Œé¢ã€‚
    *   è°ƒæ•´äº†æœç´¢æ¡†çš„æ ·å¼å’Œä½ç½®ï¼Œä½¿å…¶å±…ä¸­æ˜¾ç¤ºã€‚
    *   çª—å£æ§åˆ¶æŒ‰é’®ï¼ˆæœ€å°åŒ–ã€æœ€å¤§åŒ–ã€å…³é—­ï¼‰çš„æ ·å¼ä¹Ÿè¿›è¡Œäº†ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œå¹¶å¢åŠ äº†é¼ æ ‡æ‚¬åœæ•ˆæœã€‚

+     function createPageTurnButtons() {
